segments.text: How was the party last night ? Did you enjoy it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , don ’ t talk to me about last night ! It was the most awful evening I ’ Ve ever had .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . Mary had promised to be my date , but she stood me up . I waited for her for a full hour in the cold wind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was boring . The music was too slow and the food was lousy and , above all , I was really sick of the same old crowd all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So how long did you stay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I left after the opening dance . I couldn ’ t wait to get out of there .
segments.speaker: S2
